item.title: Hermeneutic circle
item.description: 📌 Have you ever heard of the Hermeneutic circle of Hans-Georg Gadamer ? 💡 That is exactly what applies to cybersecurity. We can’t just explain a topic in cybersecurity without addressing related topics like networks, programming, systems, and other vulnerabilities. What I learned after some of these years of study is that learning pentesting/cybersecurity is not a linear process, you can’t start from scratch. References https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hermeneutic_circle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hans-Georg_Gadamer
